fps.description: how many frames are used per second

source1.description: "left" source video to read in for concatenation

videobitratemin.description: minimal video bitrate of variable bitrate, default same as input or part of defined quality  (example: 10kbps, 10mbps, 10bps)

source2.description: "right" source video to read in for concatenation

result.description: name of struct that hold action info (default:cfvideo)

framerate.description: how many frames are used per second (alias for fps)

copyright.description: copyright meta data of the destination video

start.description: offset of destination video based on source, you can defines frames (10f) or time (1145ms,3.123s)

videobitratemax.description: maximum video bitrate of variable bitrate, default same as input or part of defined quality (example: 10kbps, 10mbps, 10bps)

author.description: author meta data of the destination video

comment.description: comment meta data of the destination video

audiobitrate.description: audio bitrate, default same as input or part of defined quality (example: 10kbps, 10mbps, 10bps)

title.description: title meta data of the destination video

destination.description: directory of the destination video to create

action.description: Type of video manipulation that the tag performs. provided actions are [info,convert,cutimage,concat]

videobitratetolerance.description: video bitrate tolerance of variable bitrate, default same as input or part of defined quality (example: 10kbps, 10mbps, 10bps)

videobitrate.description: video bitrate, default same as input or part of defined quality (example: 10kbps, 10mbps, 10bps)

audiosamplerate.description: audio sampling rate, default same as input or part of defined quality

max.description: maximum length of destination video, you can defines max frame (10f) or max time (1145ms,3.123s)

nameconflict.description: Action to take if filename is the same as that of a file in the directory. (error,skip,overwrite,makeunique)
